guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"5t89o","text":"This protocol may also be used with P0 or neonatal mouse pups.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"9k5vi","text":"NB Media:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"erdd8","text":"-500 ml Neurobasal medium w/o glutamine (Gibco 21103-049)  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nk56","text":"-10 ml 50X B27 (ThermoFisher 17504044)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4luav","text":"-5ml Glutamax (Gibco 35050-061)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ai78i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mctd","text":"Combine and sterile filter.  Do not temperature cycle, pre-equilibrate aliquots as needed.  Keeps for up to 2 months if stored at 4oC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":131,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ch0nh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75qa2","text":"Serum Media:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24ud3","text":"- 500 ml MEM w/ Earles salts w/o glutamine (Lonza 12125F) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6d5b","text":"- 25 ml FBS ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gbrg","text":"- 1.912g Glucose ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5amt","text":"- 1ml Corning MITO+ serum extender (BD CB-50006)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7s17l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2hpp1","text":"Combine and sterile filter.  Do not temperature cycle, pre-equilibrate aliquots as needed.  Keeps for up to 2 months if stored at 4oC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":131,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fimu5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"87dev","text":"Dissociation Media:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bqbj","text":" - 10 ml HBSS +MgCl2/+CaCl2 (Gibco 14025-092)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":19,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":26,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drp4d","text":" - 2mg L-cysteine (Sigma C7352), doesn’t need to be precise, ~6-10 grains added ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2btom","text":" - 100ul 100mM CaCl2  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6si8n","text":" - 100ul 50mM EDTA pH 8.0 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1roes","text":" - 20ul 0.5N NaOH ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqjal","text":" - 100ul papain (Worthington LS003126) vortex ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cp3r","text":" - 100ul 10mg/ml Dnase I (Sigma D5025)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5q4tl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejm8l","text":"Pre equilibrate HBSS to 37oC. Add in order of list, vortexing papain before addition.  Sterile filter after papain dissolves and keep at 37oC.  Make no more than 2hrs before dissection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":26,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":139,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3q43","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11gdr","text":"Neutralization Media:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1l03","text":" - 10ml Serum Media ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"98kqn","text":" - 25mg BSA culture grade (Sigma A4161-5G)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"73mb","text":" - 100ul 10mg/ml Dnase I (Sigma D5025) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6sqr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1d8j5","text":"Pre-equilibrate Serum Media to 37oC. Sterile filter after BSA dissolves and keep at 37oC.  Make no more than 2hrs before dissection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":33,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":86,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fu778","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7l7r","text":"FUDR (200x stock):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fu9bs","text":" - 100mg 5-FUDR (Sigma F0503-100mg) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9q1fp","text":" - 250mg Uridine (Sigma u3003-5g) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7t9lv","text":" - 50ml NBA Media ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5v066","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"au8fv","text":"Dissolve, sterile filter, aliquot as 1ml, and freeze. Aliquots can be freeze/thawed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4fp8p","text":"Sacrifice time-pregnant rat (E18) by CO2 asphyxiation followed by secondary method (thoracotomy or cervical dislocation).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":39,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"la4s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95s59","text":"Note: All procedures are performed in compliance with AAALAC guidelines and are approved by the Biogen Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7akqh","text":"Wash lower abdomen with 70% EtOH and make incision to reveal embryos.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c9gei","text":"One at a time, remove embryos from amniotic sac and decapitate. Cut below brain on rostral or caudal side and gently peel off skull. Remove brain and transfer to ice-cold HBSS. Repeat until desired amount of tissue is collected (~5x106 cells/brain). Decapitate any unused embryos.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":234,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"pnr9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cta69","text":"Optional: If there are significant delays between collection and dissection, you may use ice-cold Hibernate EB Complete Media (BrainBits HEB500) to extend viability. Delays between collection and dissection will impact cell viability.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fiei8","text":"Transfer brains to 10cm petri dish with ~5ml ice-cold HBSS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d9d1h","text":"Separate hemispheres, remove meninges and olfactory bulb, and dissect out desired tissue. Immediately transfer tissue to ice-cold HBSS and store on ice until all tissue is dissected.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b0rgc","text":"Decant or aspirate HBSS and add 10mL warm Dissociation Media (up to 10 brains/10mL). Rock tissue at 37oC from 30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":102,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aqbmc","text":"Allow tissue to settle and decant or aspirate Dissociation Media. Add 10mL warm Neutralization Media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ogck","text":"Remove all but 2mL of Neutralization Media, and gently triturate using P1000 pipette 10 times (avoid bubble formation). Let sit 2 minutes at RT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9jg9l","text":"Transfer supernatant (containing cell suspension) to new 15mL falcon tube, and add 2mL of Serum Media to the remaining settled tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2eo1s","text":"Repeat step 9, and then add the second cell suspension to the previously collected cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5mfb9","text":"Spin down cell suspension at 30xg for 5 minutes, and then resuspend in 10mL of Serum Media. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1am6c","text":"Assess cell count and viability, and plate as needed on poly-D-lysine coated cultureware with NB Media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"et4id","text":"Perform 50% media change using NB media every 4-7 days depending on seeding density.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6bv1n","text":"Optional: Add FUDR at DIV4 to inhibit mitotic cell growth.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"89s5e","text":"Prepare Dissociation and Neutralization media fresh and cool 15mL HBSS (+Mg/Ca) on ice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Primary Neuron Culture from Embryonic Rats
title_html: Primary Neuron Culture from Embryonic Rats
